item.title: Richmond Castle Panoramic Photo
item.description: Not because I think the photo is any good, but rather because I wanted to link to Hugin which is an amazing bit of software for making panoramic photos by joining together smaller ones, I thought I would post this panoramic photo of Richmond Castle.
